title: The Raven and the Keepers of Time
description: Springs, Idaho borders the mysterious Wilderness of No Return. A place where superstition and old native lore dominate a history that only appears to be forgotten by time. An ancient clock in the mountains holds the keys to unlock the portals of history. Sixteen-year-old Marcus Collins discovers his destiny to become a Keeper of Time, loyal guardians of the clock and compass. Marcus is joined by a colorful cast of supernaturals to battle against the ruthless forces who desire to control the secrets of the ages. The fate of the natural order hangs in the balance. Now, the last grain of sand has fallen through the hourglass and tipped the scale.The war to control the power of time has begun.
author: Shane Vlcek
